title: Journal of Health and Social Behavior - Perceived Unfair Treatment by Police and Telomere Length:  A Nashville Community-based Sample of Black and White Men
description: Author Michael McFarland discusses his article, "Perceived Unfair Treatment by Police, Race, and Telomere Length: A Nashville Community-based Sample of Black and White Men," co-authored by John Taylor, Cheryl McFarland, and Katherine Friedman. The article is published in the December 2018 issue of the Journal of Health and Social Behavior.
content:encoded: Author Michael McFarland discusses his article, "Perceived Unfair Treatment by Police, Race, and Telomere Length: A Nashville Community-based Sample of Black and White Men," co-authored by John Taylor, Cheryl McFarland, and Katherine Friedman. The article is published in the December 2018 issue of the Journal of Health and Social Behavior.
